sentences.sContent: NOTE The supply cord may be specially prepared and only available from the manufacturer or its service agent. A specially prepared cord may include a part of the appliance.
sentences.sContent_eng: NOTE The supply cord may be specially prepared and only available from the manufacturer or its service agent. A specially prepared cord may include a part of the appliance.
sentences.sCn: 注：该电源软线可以是专门制备并仅能从制造商或其服务机构处得到的。专门制备的软线也可包含器具的一部分。

phrases.pCn: 电器；电气器具，电气设备；电气用品
起重机械；起重设备；提升装置；吊具

remMethod.val: appli(看作apply， 应用)+ance→应用之物→用具， 器具

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes
